value:
The time I spend with you and Prince
Alfonse, just chatting away like this...$k$pThis world offers up so many
fascinating opportunities, doesn't it?

Isn't Princess Veronica just adorable?
I cherish that child. Any time spent
teasing her is absolutely not wasted.

If the Loki of this world is your
enemy, then I will be your ally. That
should keep things interesting!

The power to summon... The
Kingdom of Askr's ability to open
gates to other realms...$k$pI'm sure you've pondered them.
Don't mysteries like these make you
want to uncover every little detail?

If you desire to make use of me, then
by all means...ask. You summoned
me, didn't you?

Well, hello, dear. I am Loki... Let's
just say my heart and body were
stolen by your comrade...$k$pI mean $Nf,
of course.

What do you think? Come and
take a look.

Thank you! Maybe I can dream
up a way to show my gratitude.

Did you call for me? To think you'd
try and make me yours... What a
scamp you are!

I can tell by the look in your eyes that
you're here to confess your love.$k$pBefore we get to that... Can I borrow
your divine weapon? Just for a little
bit...$k$pIt is simply too much power to put in
the hands of a human!$k$pYou could rule the nine worlds and
every conceivable Outrealm...$k$pThe power at your command is truly
godlike.$k$pI can certainly think of a few things
I'd like to do with it...$k$pIs that a no? You're far too strict!$k$pDisappointing, but hardly unexpected.
We've got to get to know each other
better...$k$pAnd someday, when we're as close
as close gets, maybe you'll change
your mind.
Ah! You really shouldn't tease me.
You're very interested in touching me, aren't you?
Looking forward to what I'll say next?
I feel like you've put a spell on me. You're so bad.
